thread.title: Anushka to shake a leg in Nagarjuna's next
thread.title_full: Anushka to shake a leg in Nagarjuna's next - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Anushka to shake a leg in Nagarjuna's next
text: It is a known fact that Nagarjuna has wrapped up shooting for his up coming film Soggade Chinni Nayana. Latest update reveals that the makers have approached star actress Anushka for a special song. Though an official confirmation is yet to be received, reports reveal that Anushka has given her consent and will shoot for the song soon. Nagarjuna plays a double role in this film which also has Ramya Krishna and Lavanya Tripathi as the female leads. Keep watching this space for more interesting updates on this project.
